edu.uw.medhas.mhealthsecurityframework.acl.service.impl

Class PrivilegeServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uw.medhas.mhealthsecurityframework.acl.service.impl.PrivilegeServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrivilegeService

    public class PrivilegeServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrivilegeService
    This class implements the PrivilegeService interface. It contains methods to create a Privilege, delete a Privilege(and delete corresponding resource and operation) and check for authorization (if a particular role can perform an operation on a resource).
    Author:
    Medha Srivastava Created by medhas on 2/20/19.
